official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning October 2, 1977, and ending October 8, 1977, as National Volunteer Firemen Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to declare the week beginning October 2, 1977, and ending October 8, 1977, as "National Volunteer Firemen Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning October 2, 1977, and ending October 8, 1977, as National Volunteer Firemen Week".
